attributes.action: Pay NHS nurses overtime pay, bring pay rises back in line with inflation rates and to provide free parking for nurses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel it is unfair that nurses are often working a lot of extra hours without being paid for it. It is also appalling that nurses are effectively recieving a pay cut every year due to pay rises being out of line with inflation when they do one of the most important jobs in the country.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence:

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/hmgpay/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
